Posts.Content: Hi I was found to be HR2 weakly positive, they say less than 2% so no need for hormone replacement as the side effects of talking them outweigh the small chance of it coming back!  You just have to live in hope they know what they are doing.  Good luck with your outcome. Sandy
Posts.Title: Post surgery path report

Posts.Content: Great news Londonlass & a good start to 2017. Wishing you & all on this site a very healthy (healthier) new year.
Posts.Title: THANKYOU SO MUCH

Posts.Content: Hi CD41  I’m sorry you are where you are & as I’m a SBC so can’t offer much but a friendship hug my lovely You have done the right thing getting in touch with your BCN & hopefully get it sorted very soon. Take care of yourself  Sandy59

petition the government to continue Kadcyla for breast cancer patients...

Posts.Content: Not gods hands but Good hands.....
Posts.Title: Diagnosed November 2016 treatments at Nottingham City Hospital anyone...

Posts.Content: I was diagnosed in June 2016 at city hospital BI on a routine mammogram. Finished in may 2017. You are in gods hands. Have you been to Maggies's cancer centre on site?
Posts.Title: Diagnosed November 2016 treatments at Nottingham City Hospital anyone...

Posts.Content: It's only what you deserve my lovely... All the very best
Posts.Title: Looking Positive :)

Posts.Content: After suffering bad constipation after 2 chemo sessions my consultant put me on movicol & senna on this last occasion & after taking the highest dose possible along with some prunes & plenty fluids am much improved.  All the best
Posts.Title: Cure for constipation

Posts.Content: I know this question could be asked of my consultant oncologist but prefer to ask this groups opinion. I remember reading information about abstaining from sex while on chemotherapy or use protection.  We never bothered as the mood was never there for me. Now its been a while & I want it to be safe.  Finished chemotherapy 5th April.
Posts.Title: Sex after chemotherapy

Posts.Content: Thank you for your replies & wish me luck on our 1st weekend away for a year..... and hopefully being intimate again. Sandy
Posts.Title: Sex after chemotherapy

Posts.Content: Bjez, I too have a crusty right nostril since having my second fect T. I use a little antiseptic on it & it seems to be clearing.
